bib.title: plWordNet 2.3 emo and enWordNet 1.0: a demo
bib.author: Maziarz, Marek and Piasecki, Maciej and Rudnicka, Ewa and SzpakowiczT, Stan
bib.abstract: We present plWordNet, the largest wordnet in existence today, and plWordNet emo, the largest Polish sentiment lexicon. We show examples of lexical units and semantic relations, the basic statistics of plWordNet, and the statistics and the evaluation of sentiment
